Hello, I'm TÃ¹ng Cao, a.k.a ==tungcv== or ==cvtung==, a full-time web developer. I also spend some efforts and idle hours into my pet projects which are more or less for personal purpose only but there are many interesting things you may find useful in my Github repositories [@cvtung](https://github.com/cvtung). Nothing much to brag about but they're my proud works ðŸ˜‰
Sometimes I write (short stories and poems), I compose (sound and music), I design (games and 3D models). Most of my stuffs is now at https://tungcv.com/

Drop me a message if you have any question or just want to say hi: [hello@tungcv.com](mailto:hello@tungcv.com)

title: About me
